overview: Casey Parker is getting wild with five of her hotter girlfriends. Casey shows some bi-versity when she ravages redhead stunner Jayme and brunette beauties Dana and McKenzie. But Casey stays true to her blonde roots by inviting bombshells Jana and Samantha over to play with her toys. Casey's not the only one seeing pink - Jenna, Lexi, Courtney and Jesse can't wait to get their licks in as well. Sugar and spice and everything naughty, that's what these girls are made of. Watch what happens when sex therapy is the only cure for Casey - because she's Girl Crazy!
title: Casey Parker's Girl Crazy
